name: otp-authentication
author: shahnawaz2003
preview: A customizable OTP input component for secure authentication flows with auto-focus, paste support, and validation feedback for React apps.

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback function for OTP value changes

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disables the OTP input fields (default false)

props.name: autoFocus
props.description: Automatically focuses on the first OTP input field (default true)

props.name: onSubmit
props.description: Callback when OTP is successfully submitted
